otherNames: Star Fleet , エックスボンバー , X-Bomber , Bomber X, Xボンバー
synopsis: As the year 3000 approaches, a war-torn Solar System is invaded by the Imperial Alliance in search of a supreme being, the F-01. The experimental X Bomber spacecraft with its young crew must discover the secret of F-01 and turn it against the Imperial Alliance or all will be lost.
